author: aconway
msg: * broker/Broker.cpp: Don't create Acceptor in shutdown() - required so
InProcessBroker does not attempt to bind.

author: crogers
msg: Fix for BEEHIVE-1130 - ClassCastException in the DefaultExceptionsHandler when handling JSP rendering exceptions on a direct call to a JSP. We now make sure the request is wrapped as a PageFlowRequestWrapper. I've added a new test case to cover this condition.

author: handyande
msg: Fix the links to the webdav from the front page and add a site webdav repository

author: handyande
msg: Organise the webdav servlets better, idisk extends the standard repos.
